title: Hi! Blitz - March 2016 (gnv64)
description:
Hi! Blitz - March 2016 (no Ads)
English | 114 pages | True PDF | 42.1 mb

Hi! BLITZ is a premium lifestyle magazine that introduces India's aspiring affluent to the good life. It covers iconic personalities from all walks of life and creates lifestyle benchmarks for readers to aspire to. It's the magazine that India's rich and famous love talking to and with whom they share their most intimate moments!

CONTENTS
64 SONAKSHI UNPLUGGED
Sonakshi Sinha is a chip of the old block (like father Shatrughan Sinha), when it comes to shooting from the lip. She shares with Hi! Blitz how she is ready to be a singing star and how she can go into action mode both in reel and real life.
32 SIMPLICITYâ€™S SUPER SUCCESS
With her pulse firmly on what the average Indian woman wants, Anita Dongre has built a fashion empire that has hit bulls-eye. Hi! Blitz features the reticent designer.
38 DILIGENT DESIGNING 
Sheela Levy, interior designer and entrepreneur, takes Hi! Blitz on a whirlwind tour of her beautiful homes in Zurich, London, Mumbai and Mallorca.
44 CHANDNI RAATEIN
Sultry, lissome Amy Jackson goes all oomph for Hi! Blitz encouraged sartorially by Babita Malkani. Get those heels out, ladies.
53 HIDDEN HIDEAWAYS
Always on the quest for unusual destinations, Hi! Blitz points you in the right direction with some off-the-beaten track places that you would have to search on the map.
90 NEW NORDIC DEMYSTIFIED
Itâ€™s a cuisine that is ethnic to its geography. Hi! Blitz traces what Nordic cuisine is all about and how itâ€™s slowly making its way up the culinary charts.
94 CAPITAL WORK
Creativity takes centre stage in the beautiful homes of these Delhi women who follow their passions. Hi! Blitz features the Capitalâ€™s femme achievers.
